rugs have a soul

Formed by families in village homes and neighbors in cooperatives, each rug is fashioned through the tying of thousands of knots.

Bringing the World, Into Your Home

Each handcrafted rug of the Artisan Rug Gallery is individually selected for its fine quality, uniqueness, and vastness of color, directly from the creators of the rugs themselves. They speak to the rich cultural mosaic of Turkey, Iran, Egypt, Pakistan, India, Afghanistan and Easter Europe. Our phenomenial selection guarantees a rug for every taste. Our galleries are a premier source of new and antique, one-of-a-kind hand-woven rugs, located throughout the Rocky Mountains.
